title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8106.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8106.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) Route 60. The
northbound and southbound roadways of Route 60, between exit 59 of IR 90 and
exit 12 of Route 17, the Southern Tier Expressway, in the Towns of Dunkirk, Pomfret, Stockton, Charlotte, Gerry and Ellicott, and the Villages of Fredonia, Cassadaga and Sinclairville. (b) Route 17. Route 17, the Southern Tier Expressway, between the

Chautauqua-Cattaraugus county line and the New York-Pennsylvania state line in
the Towns of Poland, Ellicott, Ellery, North Harmony, Sherman and

Mina. (c) Route 430. The eastbound
and westbound roadways of Route 430 between Strunk Road and Washington Street
in the Town of Ellicott and the City of Jamestown. (d) Route 394. The eastbound and westbound
roadways of Route 394, North Portage Road between I-90 (exit 60) and Bourne

Street in the Town of Westfield and the Village of Westfield; provided, however, that this route is designated as an access highway for use by
tractor-semi-trailer combinations with no overall length limitations and for
vehicles 102 inches wide, and is not hereby designated as an access highway for
tandem trailer vehicles. (e) Route
20. Route 20 between Newton Street and Roberts Road in the Village of Fredonia
and the Towns of Pomfret and Sheridan. (f) Middle Road. Middle Road (CR 121) between

Route 5 and Urban Road, in the City of Dunkirk and the Town of

Dunkirk. (g) Roberts Road. Roberts

Road (CR 136) between Urban Road and Route 20, in the Towns of Dunkirk and

Sheridan. (h) Urban Road. Urban

Road, CR 121, between Roberts Road and Middle Road in the City of Dunkirk and
the Town of Dunkirk. (i) South Work

Street. South Work Street between Route 394 and Allen Street, in the Town of

Ellicott and the Village of Falconer. (j) [Eff. until June 22, 1994, see also subd. (j) below.] Tiffany Avenue between Route 394 (North Main Street) and Hopkins

Avenue in the Village of Falconer and the City of Jamestown. (j) [Eff. June 22, 1994 until Sept. 2, 1998, see also subd. (j) above and below.] Route 60. Route 60 between Washington

Street and the driveway to Central Tractor in the City of Jamestown and the

Town of Kiantone. (j) [Eff. Sept. 2, 1998, see also subd. (j) above.] Tiffany Avenue. Tiffany Avenue between

Route 394 (West Main Street) and Buffalo Street in the City of Jamestown and
the Village of Falconer. (k) [Eff. until April 21, 1993, see also subd. (k) below.] Route 394. Route 394 between
exit 13 of Route 17, the Southern Tier Expressway and South Work Street in the

Town of Ellicott and the Village of Falconer. (k) [Eff. April 21, 1993, see also subd. (k)
above.] Route 394. Route 394 between exit 13 of Route 17, the Southern Tier

Expressway and Tiffany Avenue in the Town of Ellicott, Village of Falconer and
the City of Jamestown. (l) CR 380. CR 380 between Route 60 and Elmwood Avenue in the Towns of Gerry, Ellicott and
the Village of Falconer. (n) US
Route 62. US Route 62 between Route 17 (exit 14) and the Pennsylvania state
line in the Towns of Poland, Carroll and Kiantone. (o) Vineland Avenue. Vineland Avenue between

Route 60 and Central Avenue in the City of Dunkirk and the Town of

Dunkirk. (p) US Route 20. US Route
20 between the Erie-Chautauqua county line and Roberta Road in the Town of

Sheridan, Town of Hanover and the Village of Silver Creek. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8106.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
